OrgWideEmailAddress.name: OrgWideEmailAddress
OrgWideEmailAddress.description: Represents an organization-wide email address for user profiles.

Address.description: An email alias that can be used by users of your org.

DisplayName.description: The name used to identify the sender of the email.

IsAllowAllProfiles.description: If true, any user profile in your organization can use this object. If false, only specified user profiles can use this object when sending email. If you do not have the appropriate user profile, you canâ€™t use this object.

IsVerified.description: Indicates whether the email address has been verified by its owner.

Purpose.description: Indicates how an email address can be used. UserSelection allows users with the correct profile to select the address as the From address for an email.
